resources.string: Use Translator function to check on the sign language and form words as you wished.
Learner function provides a wide range of categories of sign languages for you to explore and learn yourself!
Check out our community to find out more about the relevant Deaf Societies in Malaysia!
Test what you have learnt now on the Quiz function.
Library function allows you to search for relevant .
Find it helpful? Click here for more tips!
